cardExpiry.description: Should provided only in case of Virtual Card, Format: MMyy

cardType.description: defining card types, allowed values are GPR_VIR, GPR_PHY, GPR_VIR_UP2PHY

cardNumberLast4Digits.description: Last 4 digit of the card number

blockAction.description: The blockAction value can be permanentBlock, temporaryBlock, or unblock.

reason.description: This field will be populated for permanent block only. The value can be fraud, cardLost, cardStolen, and damaged.

cardExpiryTest.description: Expiry date to be set for virtual and virtual upgraded to physical cards. This field is not required for a physical card.

cardFeeCurrencyCode.description: Currency in which the client wants to levy the card issuance fee.
